Comment: It is a scam that has been around for quite a while:  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miracle_Mineral_Supplement  The US government used to warn against this sort of thing and even occasionally prosecute people who claimed it would cure cancer or HIV or Autism or anything else.  In theory bleach will cure all conditions and  diseases if you administer it in high enough doses (the same way that a guillotine will cure dandruff), but the formulations that this stuff is usually sold in are diluted enough that the negative health effects are usually not that bad.  Lots of people take this snakeoil without dying. they also don't get better from whatever they are taking this for, but overall nothing too bad happens.
